title: The ultimate solution for managing medicines
home.description: Smart Medication Dispenser with Remote Monitoring for Doctors and Caregivers.

device.title: Prototype
device.description: We designed our Smart Dispenser to help people manage multiple medications, assuring an easy and safe drug administration. It allows caretakers to monitor an elderlyâ€™s adherence to the treatment via our custom application. Our device provides many wonderful features like notifications with LEDs and audio, a large display with the treatment adherence and effortlessly replaceable containers for pills.
